##Challenge 1

```{r}
library(stringr)

sentence <- "Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed."

str_split(sentence, " ")

word_vector <- unlist(str_split(sentence, " "))

third_words <- word_vector[seq(1, length(word_vector), by = 3)]

print(third_words)
```

##Challenge 2

```{r}
m <- matrix(data = 1:80, nrow = 8, ncol = 10, byrow = FALSE)
print(m)

x1 <- m[,c(2, 3, 6)]
print(x1)
x2 <- m[6:8, ]
print(x2)
x3 <- m[2:6, 2:9]
print(x3)
```

##Challenge 3

```{r}
a <- array(data = 400:1, dim = c(5, 5, 4, 4))

x4 <- a[1, 1, 1, 2]
print(x4)
x5 <- a[2, 3, 2, ]
print(x5)
x6 <- a[1:5, 1:5, 3, 3]
print(x6)
```

##Challenge 4

```{r}
primate_taxonomy <- list(
  Primates = list(
    Haplorhini = list(
      Anthropoidea = list(
        Platyrrhini = list(
          Cebidae = list(),
          Atelidae = list(),
          Pitheciidae = list()
        ),
        Catarrhini = list(
          Cercopithecidae = list(),
          Hylobatidae = list(),
          Hominidae = list()
        )
      ),
      Tarsioidea = list(
        Tarsiidae = list()
      )
    ),
    Strepsirhini = list(
      Lorisoidea = list(
        Lorisidae = list(),
        Galagidae = list()
      ),
      Lemuroidea = list(
        Cheirogaleidae = list(),
        Lepilemuridae = list(),
        Indriidae = list(),
        Lemuridae = list(),
        Daubentoniidae = list()
      )
    )
  )
)
print(primate_taxonomy)
```

##Challenge 5

```{r}
m3 <- matrix(c(3, 0, 1,
               23, 1, 2,
               33, 1, 1,
               42, 0, 1,
               41, 0, 2),
             nrow = 5,
             ncol = 3,
             byrow = TRUE)


df3 <- as.data.frame(m3)
print(df3)
df3[, 2] <- as.logical(df3[, 2])
df3[, 3] <- as.factor(df3[, 3])

str(df3)

```
